nodes.bodyText: Won't this redirect the user in the browser to this URL? So shouldn't we get the public URL of Alert? or is the idea here to limit it to only users with access to the container?
The "localhost" portion is just because the URL is optional. If there is another variable available, I can use that, but I don't know of one.
alert properties will have the public URL if the ALERT_SERVER_HOST environment variable is set. It's the same variable we use to put in the emails for the alert server url
